reviewText: I never thought that I could learn to finger spell accurately and quickly until I used this DVD.  This is the best and only way to become proficient and confident with finger spelling.  I loved it and can't wait to go to the next level.  Bob is incredible and makes it so easy and fun to learn.
The best way to learn fingerspeling. I had trouble with figerspelling until I started to use this dvd. My fingerspelling has improved 100%
